content.rendered:
Dr. Michael Morbius, suffering from a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, takes a desperate gamble. What at first appears to be a radical success soon turns out to be a cure that is worse than the disease.

Directed By Daniel Espinosa

Written By Matt Sazama. Burk Sharpless

Stars: Jared Leto. Matt Smith. Adria Arjona
